      void autoMoveRobots()
      The method first of all doing the next move in the game, than update the fruits and robots of the class and prepare the next step of each robot.The method sort the fruit in the list by they value the biggest first check who the robot that can eat the fruit first, and this robot go to the fruit, and the same check for the fruits that left with the robots that left.

      • autoMoveRobots

        public void autoMoveRobots()
        The method first of all doing the next move in the game, than update the fruits and robots of the class and prepare the next step of each robot.The method sort the fruit in the list by they value the biggest first check who the robot that can eat the fruit first, and this robot go to the fruit, and the same check for the fruits that left with the robots that left.
